name: SmellyBag
description:
Game created for MageJam4! For full experience play downloadable version.

Smellybag is Dracula’s scarecrow and he was obligated to cut out outgrown bushes in royal maze, but he lost his gardening scissors. He really wants to find a way into the middle of this labirynth, because he remembers he had left them somewhere in there… Lead him towards the center, cut out outgrown bushes and leave this scary place!

Developers: 

Graphics - Barbara Kaniewska, 

Design - Dominik Błaszczyk, 

Programmer and Special Effects - Edyta Janicka
